knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r loadLibraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE}
library(xml2)
library(data.table)
setDTthreads(0L)
```

```{r dsse}
DSSE <- read_xml("./DSSE/Tags.xml")
ATTRS <- xml_attrs(xml_child(DSSE, 1))
DSTags <- data.table(ID = as.integer(xml_attr(xml_children(DSSE), "Id")),
                     Tag = xml_attr(xml_children(DSSE), "TagName"),
                     Count = as.integer(xml_attr(xml_children(DSSE), "Count")))
setkey(DSTags, Tag)
```
```{r sose}
# CSV file is result of query: 
# SELECT DISTINCT * FROM   `bigquery-public-data.stackoverflow.tags`;
# In Google's BigQuery public data set

SOTags <- fread("./DSSE/results-20191010-234132.csv")
SOTags[, 4:5 := NULL]
setnames(SOTags, names(SOTags), c("ID", "Tag", "Count"))
setkey(SOTags, Tag)
SharedT <- intersect(SOTags[, Tag], DSTags[, Tag])
```
